home_future_slogan: The highlights of the future are the best of today
home_impact_description:
I'm Bruno, and I turn digital challenges into smooth, intelligent processes.
Driven by constant innovation, I use this space to create, showcase, and teach. Explore my projects or dive into the blog to see the behind-the-scenes of this journey.
home_pricing_card_automation_phrase: Leave the repetitive work to the machines.
home_pricing_card_automation_description: From your business to your personal routine, streamline countless tasks. Focus on what really matters while everything runs on autopilot!
home_pricing_card_classes_phrase: Gain the autonomy to create exactly what you need.
home_pricing_card_classes_description: Programming classes in various formats, from beginner to advanced. Understand every step of the process to develop excellent projects.
home_pricing_card_websites_description: Build a professional, optimized online presence. Websites, e-commerce, and internal systems with exclusive design and features crafted for growth and efficient management.
home_blog_subtitle: Have you seen any of my recent posts?
automation_pricing_subtitle: Stop struggling with repetitive tasks and let technology work for you.
automation_point_errors_description: Manual errors are costly. With validated automations and scripts, you ensure your data and reports are always 100% accurate, free from human error.
automation_point_sheets_description: Go beyond basic formulas. Turn your Excel or Google Sheets into robust systems that process data and generate insights automatically.
automation_point_integration_description: Make your tools talk to each other. Connect your CRM, email, and spreadsheets so information flows without you ever needing to copy and paste.
automation_point_time_description: Repetitive tasks drain your energy. Automate processes that take hours and execute them in seconds, focusing on what actually brings profit to your business.
automation_feature_files_description: Scripts to rename, convert, and organize large volumes of files or photos in seconds, eliminating manual work on your PC.
automation_feature_rpa_description: Automations that access websites, fill out forms, and collect data automatically, simulating human behavior without mistakes.
automation_feature_dashboards_descriptio: Transforming raw data from spreadsheets or systems into automatic visual panels to facilitate your decision-making.
automation_feature_iot_description: Integration of sensors, lights, and smart devices controlled by custom code and accessible via your smartphone.
automation_faq_q1: How do I receive and use the on-demand automations?
automation_faq_a1: I deliver an executable file or a simple script. You'll just need two clicks to perform the task (like organizing files or converting data) instantly on your computer.
automation_faq_q2: Do I need expensive devices for the IoT plan?
automation_faq_a2: Not necessarily. I use components with excellent cost-benefit (like ESP32). I send you the shopping list, or I deliver the device ready and configured for your home or business.
automation_faq_q3: What happens if the website or system I use changes?
automation_faq_a3: Browser automations (RPA) may need adjustments if the site changes drastically. That's why I offer a support period and usage assistance to ensure everything keeps running perfectly.
automation_faq_q4: Will my data and passwords be safe?
automation_faq_a4: Absolutely. In the On-Demand and Commercial plans, scripts run locally on your machine. Your data and passwords do not pass through my server; the code belongs to you and operates privately.
automation_faq_q5: Can I control lights and outlets while away from home?
automation_faq_a5: Yes! In the IoT plan, we configure an app or a simple interface on your phone so you have full control of your devices from anywhere with internet access.
automation_feature_file_desc: Scripts to rename, convert, and organize large volumes of files or photos in seconds, eliminating manual work on your PC.
classes_hero_title_start: Stop being just a consumer and
classes_hero_highlight: become a creator of the future
classes_point_prod_desc: Boost your productivity with computational thinking, identify processes that can be optimized or completely automated, and make a difference wherever you are.
classes_point_web_desc: Create interactive and responsive websites completely from scratch. Understand the entire structure, code, planning, and precise steps to develop a web page.
classes_point_data_desc: Data is the source of knowledge. Learn how to organize it so that search and insertion become clear and objective, in addition to learning how to extract valuable insights for your business or career.
classes_point_back_desc: Understand how apps and games are made, unlock the power to create what you need or envision, bringing ideas to life with your own hands.
classes_feature_prod_desc: Your goals and learning style are considered in every lesson plan. This way, you get the most out of your time.
classes_feature_basic_desc: The pace is personalized; the class follows your learning rhythm and starts exactly from your current level.
classes_feature_feedback_desc: You won't need to spend hours searching for a solution to an error; you will be guided to the solution in a way that helps you understand the reason behind it.
classes_feature_custom_desc: Learn by building something of real interest to you. No generic projectsâ€”we focus on your goals and personal tastes.
classes_pricing_subtitle: Technology is present in every field; be part of the future.
classes_faq_a1: No, it is not. The classes start from your current knowledge, whether basic or advanced.
classes_faq_a2: For private modalities, the schedule is agreed upon in advance, aligning your availability and preference with mine.
classes_faq_q3: Is there a travel fee for in-person classes?
classes_faq_a3: No fees! However, we only cover the municipality of Saquarema.
websites_point_person_desc: Your brand, your rules. Unlike social media, a website allows you to convey the real essence of your work through an exclusive designâ€”whether minimalist or artisticâ€”creating an immediate and unique visual connection with your client.
websites_point_center_desc: The heart of your digital presence. Gather all your content, services, and contacts in one place. A website acts as the strategic anchor for your social media, serving as the definitive guide that leads your audience.
websites_point_cred_desc: Authority that builds trust. In the digital market, a custom domain is the biggest sign of professionalism. It validates your content, protects your image against third-party platform instability, and ensures your brand is taken seriously.
websites_point_avail_desc: Your storefront open to the world. Be present where searches happen. A well-structured site ensures your brand is found by new customers 24 hours a day, functioning as a professional presentation that never sleeps.
websites_feature_design_desc: Not just a pretty site. We develop an interface focused on conversion, where every button and section is positioned to guide your client toward a decision.
websites_feature_code_desc: Custom-made sites are lightweight and fast. This ensures your client doesn't give up on a purchase due to loading delays and improves your ranking on Google.
websites_feature_config_desc: We take care of all the technical parts: from registering your professional domain to configuring servers and high-security hosting.
websites_feature_scale_desc: Unlike limited platforms, your site can grow with your business, allowing you to add new functions and custom tools in the future.
websites_pricing_subtitle: Don't build your base on other platforms; create your own solid foundation.
websites_faq_q1: How long does it take for the site to be ready?
websites_faq_a1: The timeframe varies by plan: the Essential is usually delivered within 30 business days, while Custom projects depend on the complexity of the chosen features.
websites_faq_a2: Yes! Unlike rental platforms, the code and domain are yours. You will have full autonomy and ownership over the final project.
websites_faq_a3: The domain is your address on the web (e.g., www.yourcompany.com), and hosting is where the website files are stored. I assist with the entire technical configuration of these services.
websites_faq_q4: Will my site appear on Google?
websites_faq_a4: Yes. All plans include basic SEO optimization so your site gets indexed. In the Advanced and Custom plans, we apply deeper strategies to improve your ranking in search results.
websites_faq_q5: Does the site work well on mobile?
websites_faq_a5: Absolutely. I develop sites with responsive design, meaning they adapt perfectly to any screen, whether it's a computer, tablet, or smartphone.
websites_faq_q6: What if I need changes in the future?
websites_faq_a6: In the Custom plan, you receive training to manage your own content. Additionally, I offer support for updates and new features on demand.
